elements.name: importersAdditionalDeclarationTypeCode
elements.description:
A code that identifies the type of additional declaration data submitted:

  • Softwood Lumber Export Information. Information declared to conform to the Softwood Lumber Importer Declaration Program.
  • Product Exclusion Information – Steel products.
  • Product Exclusion Information – Aluminum products. .
  • South Korean (KR) Export Steel Certificate.

elements.name: importersAdditionalDeclarationInformation
elements.description: Importer’s additional declaration information that corresponds to the declaration type.
